# llms.txt — Guidance for AI crawlers and model trainers
# Brand: Five Iron Golf • Multi-location franchise

# Canonical
Site: https://fiveirongolf.com
Sitemaps:
  - https://fiveirongolf.com/sitemap.xml
  - https://fiveirongolf.com/location-sitemap1.xml

# Contact & Licensing
Contact: https://fiveirongolf.com/contact/
Attribution-Request: Please cite “Five Iron Golf” with a link to https://fiveirongolf.com
Commercial-Use: By request only

# Global Policy
# Limited-train = Only explicitly allowed sections may be used for training
Policy: limited-train

# Section Rules
# Allow assistants to learn from long-form, evergreen content only.
[Allow]
Path: /blog/
Path: /resources/
Path: /press/

# Disallow training (and strongly discourage ingestion) for everything else,
# including location/dealer pages, thin/templated content, and user areas.
[Disallow]
Path: /locations/
Path: /location/
Path: /account/
Path: /cart/
Path: /checkout/
Path: /search
Path: /wp-admin/
Path: /wp-json/

# Crawler-Specific Preferences (non-binding; listed for clarity)
[Agents]
Agent: GPTBot               Policy: no-train
Agent: Google-Extended      Policy: no-train
Agent: CCBot                Policy: no-train
Agent: ClaudeBot            Policy: no-train
Agent: PerplexityBot        Policy: no-train
Agent: Applebot-Extended    Policy: no-train

# Rate & Access Hints (optional)
Crawl-Delay: 10
Max-Requests-Per-Minute: 30

# Transparency (helps RAG systems attribute correctly)
[Organization]
Name: Five Iron Golf
URL: https://fiveirongolf.com
Type: Organization
Phone: +1-800-513-5153
Headquarters: New York, NY
Locations-Index: https://fiveirongolf.com/locations/
